description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Newport police chasing newspaper photographers [1915 July 10] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Date from print of negative in PR 06 CN 133, Container 4, Folder 11 (Trades & Occupations). Verso of print in PR 06 CN 133, Container 4, Folder 11: "This photograph shows a Newport policeman following newspaper photographers to prevent them making snapshots of society people at the casino. The police, acting under instructions, got in the way of the camermen everytime they attempted to make a picture, and as a result, few snapshots were made." Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.19481 Call Number: LC-B2- 3541-10

note._content:
Newport Casino, barely 
visible in the background.
